head.title: Home - Coolidge Unified School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Coolidge Unified School District

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to Coolidge Unified School District

div.p: Use our district's website to learn more about our schools and community. Our site includes information about job opportunities, vendor information, individual school websites, ongoing news and events, and links to other helpful resources, including Board Policies. If you are unable to find what you are looking for, please contact us directly.

div.style: border-width: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 3px; top: 16px; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute;

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px currentColor; border-image: none; color: rgb(18, 35, 38); line-height: 18px; font-family: "Century Gothic", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-stretch: inherit;

div.p: The Coolidge Unified School District #21 is located in Pinal County, Arizona. We are about 20 minutes south of the Phoenix East Valley and are positioned to become one of the fastest growing school districts in Arizona. Check us out! We know you'll like what you see.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px currentColor; border-image: none; color: rgb(18, 35, 38); line-height: 18px; font-family: "Century Gothic", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; vertical-align: baseline; font-stretch: inherit;

div.p: We are quite proud of our full academic program for regular, gifted, and special education serving grades Pre-K through 12, as well as the Career and Technical and alternative high school educational services provided. Take some time to browse through our website, find out more about our district, and learn more about what we have to offer our students, employees, and our community

br.span: Click here for the 2020 Budget Adoption Public Hearing Notification.

p.span: On June 12th, the CUSD Governing Board approved the 2019-2020 proposed expenditure budget. Click the the budget summary below for the full budget documents. This budget includes teacher raises, as intended by Governor Ducey's 20X2020. The approved teacher raises will bring the average, base teacher salary up to $52,488 from $49,989. The starting, base salary is $42,143.

img.title: Silent Witness Poster
img.br:

Coolidge High School/Jr. High- 520-723-2304
West Elementary- 520-723-2702
Heartland Ranch- 520-424-2100
CAP- 520-723-2115
Choose option #8

a.title: Battle of Books - Heartland "Wildcats" vs West "Tigers"
a.span: Battle of Books - Heartland "Wildcats" vs West "Tigers"

div.p: The Coolidge Unified School District, a district of 233 square miles, has been serving the city of Coolidge and its surrounding areas, including the Gila River Indian Community since 1935.

br.br:
Provide comprehensive academic and social learning for all students based on the needs of the stakeholders.
Click below for information regarding employee COVID-19 sick leave:

div.div: 450 North Arizona Boulevard, Coolidge, AZ 85128 | Phone 520-723-2040 | Fax
